Text.Page:
Mission orders

To empower our forces on the home front, Velika Headquarters will supply warhorses to skilled soldiers. Return to headquarters at once.

—Dougal, Velika Consul

Welcome, ! It's a shame a skilled soldier like you has been walking all this time.

Better to spend money on fine horses than on extra boot-leather, eh? A swift steed should help you get from mission to mission faster.

You must be the that Dougal mentioned. I knew you'd come, but...my horses have grown restless lately, and they're not obeying their riders.

Maybe veridian extract can calm their nerves. Gather some veridia plants around here and extract the oils. Then I'd feel better about turning these big boys loose.
This is just the thing—our horses are doing much better! Take this small token of my appreciation. It's one of my best, so I hope it'll be helpful for you.
Please bring me veridian extract. They'll make our horses less restless.
